body_html:
i met the same problem when i set up it in a titianx. but after a few days，the example run well automatically. however，the machine is about 5x slower when running lstm. I don't know whether these are related.

发自我的 iPhone

在 2016年9月1日，上午6:55，zheng-xq notifications@github.com 写道：

@fbolanos, @cr145, I put on a GTX 1080 on my local machine, but couldn't reproduce the problem.

My exact steps:

git clone http://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow --recursive ** f974e8d for my experiment.
cd tensorflow
printf "\n\n\ny\n\n8.0\n/usr/local/cuda-8.0\n5.0.5\n/usr/local/cudnn-5.0\n\n" | ./configure
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/cudnn-5.0/lib64 \ bazel-bin/tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer --use_gpu
Output:

...
000001/000009 lambda = 2.000000 x = [0.894427 -0.447214] y = [1.788854 -0.894427]
000001/000009 lambda = 2.000000 x = [0.894427 -0.447214] y = [1.788854 -0.894427]

Setup:

GTX 1080, Ubuntu 14.04, Cuda 8.0, Cudnn 5.0.5, bazel 0.3.0, Cuda driver 367.35
Please let me know if you still have problem if you match my steps as close as possible. If so, something very fishy is going on.

—
You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

body:
i met the same problem when i set up it in a titianx. but after a few days，the example run well automatically. however，the machine is about 5x slower when running lstm. I don't know whether these are related.

发自我的 iPhone

> 在 2016年9月1日，上午6:55，zheng-xq notifications@github.com 写道：
> 
> @fbolanos, @cr145, I put on a GTX 1080 on my local machine, but couldn't reproduce the problem.
> 
> My exact steps:

> git clone http://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow --recursive *\* f974e8d for my experiment.
> cd tensorflow
> printf "\n\n\ny\n\n8.0\n/usr/local/cuda-8.0\n5.0.5\n/usr/local/cudnn-5.0\n\n" | ./configure
> bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer
> LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/cudnn-5.0/lib64 \ bazel-bin/tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer --use_gpu
> Output:
